smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

smells.name: RedundantVisibilityModifierRule
smells.description: Checks for redundant visibility modifiers. Public is the default visibility for classes. The public modifier is redundant.

instances.message: accounts is explicitly marked as public. Properties are public by default so this modifier is redundant.

Private property PREFERENCE_ADVANCED_PUSH_SETTINGS is unused.
Private property PREFERENCE_REMOTE_SEARCH is unused.

smells.name: UseDataClass
smells.description: Classes that do nothing but hold data should be replaced with a data class.

instances.message: The class AccountState defines nofunctionality and only holds data. Consider converting it to a data class.
The class ContactLetterBitmapConfig defines nofunctionality and only holds data. Consider converting it to a data class.
The class MessagingListenerProvider defines nofunctionality and only holds data. Consider converting it to a data class.

smells.name: DataClassContainsFunctions
smells.description: Data classes should mainly be used to store data and should not have any extra functions. (Compiler will automatically generate equals, toString and hashCode functions)

instances.message: The data class PasswordPromptResult contains functions which are not registered conversion functions. The offending method is called asIntent
The data class ComposeCryptoStatus contains functions which are not registered conversion functions. The offending method is called allRecipientsCanEncrypt
The data class ComposeCryptoStatus contains functions which are not registered conversion functions. The offending method is called canEncryptAndIsMutualDefault

The data class ComposeCryptoStatus contains functions which are not registered conversion functions. The offending method is called withRecipientAutocryptStatus

The data class Identity contains functions which are not registered conversion functions. The offending method is called withSignature
The data class Identity contains functions which are not registered conversion functions. The offending method is called withSignatureUse
The data class Identity contains functions which are not registered conversion functions. The offending method is called withEmail

smells.name: WildcardImport
smells.description: Wildcard imports should be replaced with imports using fully qualified class names. Wildcard imports can lead to naming conflicts. A library update can introduce naming clashes with your classes which results in compilation errors.

instances.message: kotlinx.coroutines.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
com.fsck.k9.Account.SortType.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
com.fsck.k9.search.SearchSpecification.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
com.fsck.k9.Account.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.

smells.name: ReturnCount

smells.name: CollapsibleIfStatements
smells.description: Two if statements which could be collapsed were detected. These statements can be merged to improve readability.

instances.message: Two if statements which could be collapsed were detected. These statements can be merged to improve readability.

smells.name: NewLineAtEndOfFile
smells.description: Checks whether files end with a line separator.

instances.message: The file StorageTest.kt is not ending with a new line.
The file AutocryptGossipHeaderParserTest.kt is not ending with a new line.
The file MimePartStreamParserTest.kt is not ending with a new line.
The file NotificationStrategy.kt is not ending with a new line.
The file LocalKeyStoreManager.kt is not ending with a new line.
The file AccountSearchConditions.kt is not ending with a new line.
The file LocalStoreProvider.kt is not ending with a new line.

smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

instances.message:
Parentheses in ("""From: <x@example.org>
To: <y@example.org>
Subject: Testmail 1
Content-Type: multipart/mixed; boundary=1

--1
Content-Type: text/plain

some text in the first part
--1
Content-Type: message/rfc822; name="message"

To: <z@example.org>
Subject: Hi
Date: now
Content-Type: text/plain

inner text
--1--""") are unnecessary and can be replaced with: """From: <x@example.org>
To: <y@example.org>
Subject: Testmail 1
Content-Type: multipart/mixed; boundary=1

--1
Content-Type: text/plain

some text in the first part
--1
Content-Type: message/rfc822; name="message"

To: <z@example.org>
Subject: Hi
Date: now
Content-Type: text/plain

inner text
--1--"""

Parentheses in ("""From: <x@example.org>
To: <y@example.org>
Subject: Testmail 2
Content-Type: multipart/mixed; boundary=1

--1
Content-Type: text/plain

some text in the first part
--1
Content-Type: message/rfc822; name="message"
Content-Disposition: attachment

To: <z@example.org>
Subject: Hi
Date: now
Content-Type: text/plain

inner text
--1--""") are unnecessary and can be replaced with: """From: <x@example.org>
To: <y@example.org>
Subject: Testmail 2
Content-Type: multipart/mixed; boundary=1

--1
Content-Type: text/plain

some text in the first part
--1
Content-Type: message/rfc822; name="message"
Content-Disposition: attachment

To: <z@example.org>
Subject: Hi
Date: now
Content-Type: text/plain

inner text
--1--"""
Parentheses in (previousQuoteDepth + 1) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: previousQuoteDepth + 1
Parentheses in (length - 1) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: length - 1
Parentheses in (segments.size - 1) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: segments.size - 1
Parentheses in (length - 1) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: length - 1
Parentheses in (isEndIndex && offset == segmentLength) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: isEndIndex && offset == segmentLength

smells.name: UnnecessaryAbstractClass
smells.description: An abstract class is unnecessary and can be refactored. An abstract class should have both abstract and concrete properties or functions. An abstract class without a concrete member can be refactored to an interface. An abstract class without an abstract member can be refactored to a concrete class.

instances.message: An abstract class without an abstract member can be refactored to a concrete class.

smells.name: NestedClassesVisibility
smells.description: Nested types are often used for implementing private functionality and therefore this should not be public.

instances.message: Nested types are often used for implementing private functionality. However the visibility of HtmlModification makes it visible externally.
Nested types are often used for implementing private functionality. However the visibility of HtmlModification makes it visible externally.

smells.name: PreferToOverPairSyntax
smells.description: Pair was created using the Pair constructor, using the to syntax is preferred.

instances.message: Pair is created by using the pair constructor. This can replaced by `segmentIndex to offset`
Pair is created by using the pair constructor. This can replaced by `parameters to ignoredParameters`

smells.name: TrailingWhitespace
smells.description: Checks which lines end with a whitespace.

instances.message: Line 53 ends with a whitespace.
Line 54 ends with a whitespace.

smells.name: MandatoryBracesIfStatements
smells.description: Multi-line if statement was found that does not have braces. These should be added to improve readability.

instances.message: Multi-line if statement was found that does not have braces. These should be added to improve readability.
Multi-line else statement was found that does not have braces.These should be added to improve readability

smells.name: ForbiddenVoid
smells.description: `Unit` should be used instead of `Void`.

instances.message: 'Void' should be replaced with 'Unit'.
'Void' should be replaced with 'Unit'.
'Void' should be replaced with 'Unit'.
'Void' should be replaced with 'Unit'.
'Void' should be replaced with 'Unit'.
